title: 7636 S. South Shore Drive --Studio, 1 or 2 Bedroom Apartments
posting_body: 7636 S. South Shore Drive is a Great Location!
This modern elevated building has a great location on South Shore Drive with public TRANSPORTATION and THE LAKE NEARBY.
It also provides FREE OFF STREET PARKING for tenants and use of LAUNDRY ROOM.
APARTMENTS includes MAJOR APPLIANCES -- REFRIGERATOR, STOVE,  and A/C UNIT.
BLINDS AND SMOKE DETECTOR also included.
Studio and 1 Bedroom -- $350 Non-Refundable Move-In Fee after Application approval --
2 Bedroom -- $500 Non-Refundable Move-In Fee after Application approval -- No security Deposit
